posts.post_content: Looking for a Dutch Revelle, prefer raw but will consider graded SGC/PSA in the 20-30/1.5-2.5 range.  I don't mind a bit of creasing or back damage/marks.  Would also be willing to work a trade; LMK what you have...
I have a Revelle. Its a PSA 3 Hindu...
Looking for something a little less expensive... but thanks.  Old Mill or Piedmont on this one.

Just got a message from an online I store in which ordered a 1.5 stating that they don't have the card.  My trade is already in progress, so I'm in a rough spot and need to find a low grade Revelle rather quickly.
